How to search for papers in my area of interest????

How to do a Literature Review
"This paper discusses literature review as a methodology for conducting research and offers an overview of different
types of reviews, as well as some guidelines to how to both conduct and evaluate a literature review paper. It also
discusses common pitfalls and how to get literature reviews published." Hannah Snyder 2019
